title: All the tech that got our attention at F1 Miami Grand Prix - TechCrunch
content: All the tech that got our attention at F1 Miami Grand Prix  TechCrunch
description: All eyes are on Miami this weekend as the international glitterati arrives for the city’s inaugural Formula One Grand Prix. The European racing event has attracted American fans in droves, thanks to the “Netflix effect” of “Formula 1: Drive to Survive” ­— the successful franchise that’s…
